data.text:
The staff in the hotel were fantastic and couldn't do enough for you, bar staff, pool man, cleaners chefs and receptionist. The grounds are beautifully planted and tidy. The hotel is also in a great location on the beach and close to Naama bay shops and restaurants. Food is fresh and tasty but can be repeatative. Hotel is a little dated but clean. I'd definitely go back.

Places Iâ€™d recommend to visit is Farsha Mountain cafe which is stunning on an evening. 
Soho square very relaxed no hassle, The Queen Vic pub in Soho Square. 

Also Iâ€™d like to mention a taxi driver Mohammed who works outside of the hotel ( taxi number 352 )
He was very polite, reasonable and when we booked him, he was always prompt and reliable.
data.title: Friendly, clean and excellent location

data.text:
I spend a great holiday,they have a nice animation team and a great helpful staff 
The hotel have nice beach and pool
I give the hotel 5 stars for (staff,animation team,food ,beach and swimming pool
I will comeback at the next summer ******"""
data.title: Very nice hotel

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear 281sanaaw, It is our real pleasure and gratitude to receive positive comments from a very important guest like yourself. I am so happy and proud that we succeeded to meet your expectations and we managed to make your recent holiday as enjoyable as ever. Your constructive comments are well taken and will be communicated to all the department heads concerned, rest assured that only through your comments, we aim to improve the level of services that our guests' receive, and in today's world, this is essential. Once again, I would like to thank you for the time spent to write to us and we really are looking forward to seeing and welcoming you back again to your second home. Sincerely Yours,

Mostafa Khalaf
Cluster General Manager Sharm Dreams and Fayrouz
owner_response.author: Mostafa Khalaf

data.text:
My husband and I have stayed at the Fayrouz many, many times since 2001. Due to bereavement, I now go on my own, itâ€™s nice that long standing hotel staff remember my visits with my husband which makes me feel safe and comfortable.
Rooms are a bit dated but are very clean, beds are comfortable and linen is regularly changed and staff always respond to any issues. I prefer to eat my evening meal in Pirates bar where there is a good menu and cooked to order. This bar has a good atmosphere, regular evening entertainment and great staff.
The beach is probably the biggest and best in Naama Bay, lots of umbrellas and sunbeds, however at busy times and the selfishness of some  guests, finding a sun bed can be a bit of a challenge but the beach staff work hard to find them. The beach clears at lunchtime, when all inclusive guests go to lunch, so the afternoons are lovely and peaceful with lots of available sunbeds. The usual annoyance of people putting towels on sunbeds early in the morning and not appearing until hours laterðŸ˜¡
All in all, although parts of this is hotel does need a bit of an upgrade and toilets on or near the beach, itâ€™s very clean, welcoming and staff are polite, very helpful and will do all they can to resolve any issues.
I love this hotel and will keep returning.
data.title: Great hotel

data.text: The hotel grounds are stunningly beautiful - filled with greenery and flowers, providing peace and relaxation. Perfect for a tranquil getaway!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))

data.text: We were at the Jaz hotel chain in March, the sea was beautiful, cool, the hotel staff were very friendly and always ready to help. The rooms are clean and comfortable; if there were any problems, the administration immediately solved the problem. Separately, I would like to mention the lovely team of animators who always encouraged us and held interesting competitions, especially yoga and training. I especially want to shout out the wonderful animator Castelo
data.title: Fayroz
